General.Name: ISC Business Technology AG
General.Description: ISC Business Technology AG operates as an IT consulting company in Switzerland. It offers individual IT and EDP solutions that focuses on SAP; and management consultancy for enterprise resource planning, performance management, sales optimization, business analytics, customer relationship management, risk management, and IT strategies. The company also develops a competence center for finance and accounting, IT solutions, and consulting; and provides services in the fields of IT security that include selection and installation of hardware. In addition, it provides consulting services for business intelligence market; business intelligence software and services; and IT services for transport and intralogistics. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Winterthur, Switzerland.

0.Name: Mr. Peter  Heinold
0.Title: Founder, Chairman of Board of Directors & CEO
